content: Upon talking to Yin Tiger, you can choose to have a duel, which starts a boss battle. Our breakdown of the Yin Tiger boss has a detailed overview of the moves to watch out for and tips to succeed. If you are successful at taking down Yin Tiger, you will obtain the Ebon Flow Transformation.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Ebon_Flow.md', within the main section titled 'Ebon Flow', specifically from the subsection '**Black Myth: Wukong Ebon Flow Location**'.
The content is as follows:
Upon talking to Yin Tiger, you can choose to have a duel, which starts a boss battle. Our breakdown of the Yin Tiger boss has a detailed overview of the moves to watch out for and tips to succeed. If you are successful at taking down Yin Tiger, you will obtain the Ebon Flow Transformation.
